name: Roll Over Red Rover
description:
In this game you play as a rover who explores Mars for science, but behind every rock lurks a dangerous and slow waddling alien. Hesitation could mean death or even worse, MISSION FAILURE. Your goal is to maneuver around the planet and collect crystals, the fabrication of which could be a source of infinite energy for a deteriorating Earth. It is imperative for the survival of the human race that you succeed in this mission. Roll over red rover. 

Controls:

 Aim: mouse

 Shoot: click

 Move Forward: W 

Move Backward: S 

Rotate Right: D 

Rotate Left: A

Note: The red needle is a compass that guides you to your next objective.
